title: TelnyxDownstreamCampaign

assignedPhoneNumbersCount.title: AssignedPhoneNumbersCount
assignedPhoneNumbersCount.description: Number of phone numbers associated with the campaign

brandDisplayName.title: Branddisplayname
brandDisplayName.description: Display or marketing name of the brand.

embeddedLink.title: Embeddedlink
embeddedLink.description: Does message generated by the campaign include URL link in SMS?

embeddedLinkSample.title: EmbeddedLinkSample
embeddedLinkSample.description: Sample of an embedded link that will be sent to subscribers.

embeddedPhone.title: Embeddedphone
embeddedPhone.description: Does message generated by the campaign include phone number in SMS?

failureReasons.title: failureReasons
failureReasons.description: Failure reasons if campaign submission failed

helpKeywords.title: Helpkeywords
helpKeywords.description: Subscriber help keywords. Multiple keywords are comma separated without space.

isNumberPoolingEnabled.title: isNumberPoolingEnabled
isNumberPoolingEnabled.description: Indicates whether the campaign has a T-Mobile number pool ID associated with it.

numberPool.title: Numberpool
numberPool.description: Does campaign utilize pool of phone numbers?

optinKeywords.title: Optinkeywords
optinKeywords.description: Subscriber opt-in keywords. Multiple keywords are comma separated without space.

optoutKeywords.title: Optoutkeywords
optoutKeywords.description: Subscriber opt-out keywords. Multiple keywords are comma separated without space.

privacyPolicyLink.title: PrivacyPolicyLink
privacyPolicyLink.description: Link to the campaign's privacy policy.

usecase.title: Usecase
usecase.description: Campaign usecase. Must be of defined valid types. Use `/registry/enum/usecase` operation to retrieve usecases available for given brand.

sample1.title: Sample1
sample1.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 1 or more message samples.

sample2.title: Sample2
sample2.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 2 or more message samples.

sample3.title: Sample3
sample3.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 3 or more message samples.

sample4.title: Sample4
sample4.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 4 or more message samples.

sample5.title: Sample5
sample5.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 5 or more message samples.

subUsecases.title: Subusecases
subUsecases.description: Campaign sub-usecases. Must be of defined valid sub-usecase types. Use `/registry/enum/usecase` operation to retrieve list of valid sub-usecases

subscriberOptin.title: Subscriberoptin
subscriberOptin.description: Does campaign require subscriber to opt-in before SMS is sent to subscriber?

subscriberOptout.title: Subscriberoptout
subscriberOptout.description: Does campaign support subscriber opt-out keyword(s)?

tcrBrandId.title: TcrBrandid
tcrBrandId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the brand by the registry.

tcrCampaignId.title: TcrCampaignid
tcrCampaignId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the campaign by the registry.

termsAndConditionsLink.title: TermsAndConditionsLink
termsAndConditionsLink.description: Link to the campaign's terms and conditions.

webhookURL.title: WebhookURL
webhookURL.description: Webhook to which campaign status updates are sent.

webhookFailoverURL.title: WebhookFailoverURL
webhookFailoverURL.description: Failover webhook to which campaign status updates are sent.

createdAt.description: Date and time that the brand was created at.

updatedAt.description: Date and time that the brand was last updated at.

description: Campaign is generated by the 10DLC registry once the corresponding campaign request is approved. Each campaign is assigned a unique identifier - **campaignId**. Once a campaign is activated, limited information is published to the NetNumber OSR service for consumption by members of the ecosystem. When a campaign is suspended(reversible) or expired(non-reversible), campaign data is deleted from the OSR service.
